sentence: Arizona Sen. Mark Kelly, a Democrat elected in a special election in 2020, praised Breyer for protecting freedom of speech, reproductive rights and health care access as a justice.
author: Jennifer Shutt
title: Biden vows to nominate first Black woman to Supreme Court by end of February

sentence: OK, Mark Kelly, think carefully before you vote in lockstep with the radicals.
title: 'The Ingraham Angle' on Breyer's retirement, school accused of grooming student to change gender identity
How senators voted on Ketanji Brown Jackson for the Supreme Court
